price: ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߬ߞߏ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߟߋ߬ ߦߛߎߝߎ߫ ߣߴߊ߬ ߓߊߘߋ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߕߍ ߘߐ߫ ߢߌ߬ߣߌ߲߬ߞߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
